rooms.name: Living Room & Dining Area
rooms.description: Spacious open-plan living area combining dining space and entertainment zone. Designed with contemporary finishes.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with functional layout and integrated appliances. Budget optimized design.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with a dedicated balcony and ample natural light. Vastu-aligned orientation for energy.

rooms.description: Comfortable bedroom with dedicated balcony and Vastu compliant layout.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Balcony-enabled bedroom focusing on privacy and light, in line with Vastu.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated workspace with ample storage and natural lighting. Positioned to harness energy flow.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern bathroom with efficient fixtures, positioned adjacent to the master bedroom.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Small, functional guest bathroom placed conveniently near living area.

rooms.name: Utility Closet
rooms.description: Multi-functional storage area for household items and appliances.

Accessible passage connecting the living area to the swimming pool deck.

common_areas.name: Swimming Pool Deck
common_areas.description: Contemporary swimming pool with an adjoining deck area, designed to maximize relaxation within budget constraints.

vastu_notes: The design aligns with Vastu principles by orienting living spaces towards the south and west for optimal energy flow, ensuring master bedroom placement with a north-east balcony. Budget constraints are met through efficient space planning and multi-functional room usage.
